memberdef.name: Init

listitem.para: initialised it's values through text file reader as well as some other variables initialised through function parameters needed for NPC class to work

parameterdescription.para: - number of lines of dialogue the NPC has
- the path name to the text file

simplesect.para: true player is in range of interaction
false player is not in range of interaction

listitem.para: update some variables at every frame

parameterdescription.para: - to reset the dialogue if player moves out of range

simplesect.para: - dialogue for object in the form of a string

listitem.para: to check if player is within range to interact with this object

simplesect.para: true player is in range of interacting with this object
false player is not in range of interacting with this object

listitem.para: to check if player has been given a quest from this npc object

simplesect.para: false quest has not been given

listitem.para: returns dialogue for the npc when quest is complete

simplesect.para: dialogue for the npc when quest is complete

listitem.para: to get which line of dialogue the npc object should be currently displaying

simplesect.para: the line number of the dialogue as a short

listitem.para: to reset all npc dialogue when scene resets
